meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>ghost</kanji> <kanji>feeling</kanji> is <vocabulary>inspiration</vocabulary>. For some reason, the feeling of ghosts is the feeling of inspiration. I guess a ghost goes inside you and makes you feel this inspiration? Oh, wait, you can feel that because you have the <vocabulary>sixth sense</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
